tasks.task: Take hay bale with a loader and place in wagon
subtasks: Engage loader arm and bucket attachment
Grasp hay bale with fork lift mechanism
Position hay bale securely on wagon
Operate steering wheel to direct mower
Engage cutting mechanism to cut hay
Supervise hay as it is cut and placed in windrows
Use loader to pick up another hay bale
Repeat process of loading hay bale onto wagon

tasks.task: Transport hay to a storage location
subtasks: Drive tractor onto a ramp to access storage area
Place hay bale(s) onto storage rack or structure
